tool.name: Grompp
tool.description: Wrapper of the GROMACS grompp module.

param.name: input_gro_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS structure GRO file

param.name: input_top_zip_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS topology TOP and ITP files in zip format

param.name: input_cpt_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS checkpoint file CPT

param.name: input_ndx_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS index files NDX

param.name: input_mdp_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS MDP file

param.name: outname_output_tpr_path
param.help: Path to the output portable binary run file TPR

param.name: config_json
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax
